action.action-desc: Ms. Schakowsky submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: Urging the Federal Aviation Administration to continue its cooperation with airports across the United States seeking to implement noise mitigation plans, and for other purposes.

whereas.text: Whereas airport noise reduction programs must be designed to meet the specific needs and concerns of airports and their surrounding communities; and

Whereas subchapter II of chapter 475 of title 49, United States Code, popularly known as the Airport Noise and Capacity Act of 1990, provides a process by which airports may mandate restrictions on airport noise and access with FAA approval: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: urges the Federal Aviation Administration to continue its cooperation with airports across the United States that are seeking to implement noise mitigation plans; and

encourages the Federal Aviation Administration to continue its implementation of the Next Generation Air Transportation System (NextGen) and other efforts to enhance the safety of air travel and help decrease noise levels.
